application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Waste and Recycling shall be stored within each flat in accordance with Plan 651 02 PL06C and only stored / presented outside of the each flat on refuse / recycling collection day.Reason: In the interests of the visual amenity of the area.
description: Details required for Conditions 4 (Refuse and Recycling Storage Facilities) and 5 (Cycle Storage Facilities) of planning permission 19/01308/FUL (Erection of side extenison to the first floor and new roof terrace to form new 1 bed unit. Erection of rear dormer roof extension and new balcony to form new 2 bed unit.  Demolition of of existing outbuildings and erection of part single part two storey rear extension for commercial use)(Erection of side extenison to the first floor and new roof terrace to form new 1 bed unit.
